REUTERS.UNKNOWN: E f1701 reute d f BC-HAMBURGISCHE-LB-BOND 03-19 0047

TEXT.TITLE: HAMBURGISCHE LB BOND RAISED TO 75 MLN CANADIAN DLRS
TEXT.BODY: The Hamburgische Landesbank Girozentrale Canadian dollar bond issued earlier today due May 6, 1990 at 8-1/4 pct and 101-3/8 has been increased to 75 mln dlrs, said Merrill Lynch Capital Markets as lead manager. Reuter
